checkAndCreateViewIDs

public def checkAndCreateViewIDs()

deleteWithoutRedirect

public boolean deleteWithoutRedirect(Media mediaInstance, java.io.File file, java.io.File thumb, User userInstance)
This deletes a media file from the server's file system without redirecting to any view.

updateArticles

public def updateArticles(Article article, java.util.ArrayList mediaInstanceList)
This method searches the article content for file names and compares them to all media file names. If a match is found, that article is added to the media's article list.
